content: धुर् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} (<ab>Nom.</ab> <ab>sing.</ab> धूः) {@--1@} A yoke (<ab>lit.</ab>); न गर्दभा वाजिधुरं वहंति <ls>Mk. 4. 17</ls>; अत्रस्नुभिर्युक्तधुरं तुरंगैः <ls>R. 14. 47.</ls> {@--2@} ({%a%}) That part of a yoke which rests on the shoulder. ({%b%}) The foremost part of the pole where the yoke is fixed. {@--3@} The pin at both ends of an axle for fastening the nave of the wheel. {@--4@} The shaft or pole of a carriage. {@--5@} A load, burden (<ab>fig.</ab> also); responsibility, duty, task; तेन धूर्जगतो गुर्वी सचिवेषु निचिक्षिपे <ls>R. 1. 34</ls>, <ls n="R.">2. 74</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 35</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 66</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 30</ls>; कार्यधुरं वहंति <ls>Mu. 1. 14</ls>; आप्तैरप्यनवाप्तपौरुषफलैः कार्यस्य धूरुज्झिता <ls>Mu. 6. 5</ls>, <ls n="Mu.">4. 6</ls>; <ls>Ki. 3. 50</ls>; <ls n="Ki.">14. 6.</ls> {@--6@} The foremost or highest place, van, front, top, head; अपांसुलानां धुरि कीर्तनीया <ls>R. 2. 2</ls>; धुरि स्थिता त्वं पतिदेवतानां <ls n="R.">14. 74</ls>; अविघ्नमस्तु ते स्थेयाः पितेव धुरि पुत्रिणां <ls n="R.">1. 91</ls>; धुरि प्रतिष्ठापयितव्य एव <ls>M. 1. 16</ls>, <ls n="M.">5. 16.</ls> {@--7@} A finger. {@--8@} Agitation, trembling. {@--9@} Reflection. {@--10@} A spark of fire. {@--11@} Distress, affliction. {@--12@} A part, portion, share. {@--13@} Wealth. {@--14@} <ab>N.</ab> of the Ganges. (धुरि कृ ‘to place at the head or in front of’; <ls>Ś. 7. 4</ls>).
